function.name: take_screenshot
function.description: function to capture content of a webpage in a screenshot.

function.name: load_page
function.description: function to navigate to a webpage using a URL.

url.description: URL of the webpage to navigate to.

function.name: move_cursor
function.description: function to move the cursor relative to its current position using relative x and y values.

x.description: The x-coordinate to move the cursor to.

y.description: The y-coordinate to move the cursor to.

function.name: end_conversation
function.description: function to end the current conversation once the predefined objectives are complete.

function.name: click_element
function.description: function to click on an element at the cursors current location.

function.name: get_cursor_position
function.description: function to retrieve the cursors x and y coordinates on the page.

function.name: get_url
function.description: function to retrieve the current URL of the webpage.

function.name: get_clickable_element_locations
function.description: function to retrieve the x and y coordinates of all clickable elements on the page.

function.name: go_to_coords
function.description: function to move cursor to absolute x and y coordinates on the webpage.

x.description: The x-coordinate to move the cursor to.

y.description: The y-coordinate to move the cursor to.
